QuestData.Title: Onslaught's End
QuestData.Description: "Guard Gul'dan and his Shadow Council with your lives! The portal cannot function without our prisoners' fel magic. Fail me and watch all that you hold dear turn to ash.$B$B-Grommash Hellscream."$b$bThe Iron Horde appear to be holding prisoners that are crucial to keeping the portal open. Search the nearby spires!
QuestData.LogDescription: Disable the two fel spires of the Dark Portal.
QuestData.RewardText: The portal is weakened, but it remains open.$b$bOnly one option remains, $n.
